name: Windows 89
description:
This was not originally made for the game jam, but I thought I would post it here anyways. considering I started it in late July. It was made during the jam.

Info:

this program is planned to be open source, to make it customizable for those who want a custom OS experience (kind of like Linux and all of its flavors) 

I will make it open source when I finish the basic features.

Preinstalled software:

  • Paint
  • Internet Explorer
  • File Viewer
  • Image Viewer

Stuff you can download:

  • Motion (animation software) (WIP)
  • Music Maker (VERY WIP)
  • Movie Maker (ALSO VERY WIP)
  • Picture of a cute kitten
